p: The in vitro release of the nanoemulsion was investigated using the dialysis method, and the drug release in the gastrointestinal tract was simulated in vitro. A dialysis tube with a biofilm structure was placed in the buffer in a thermostatic bath at 37Â°C for simulating gastrointestinal fluid, and the drug digestion and peristalsis in the gastrointestinal tract were simulated by magnetic stirring.
